title: Colorado National Monument: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Be A Junior Ranger          Download the Jr. Ranger Activity Guide or pick one up at the Visitor Center.              EXPLORE. LEARN. PROTECT That's the Jr. Ranger Motto. Follow the steps below to earn your badge. The activity guide is designed for ages 5-12 but there is no age limit.        Working hard!   1. Complete the activities  in the Jr. Ranger Book.         Enjoying the trails.   2. Go for a hike!        Congratulations!   3. Have your work checked by a ranger to receive your Jr. Ranger Badge and Certificate.
